title: 10th Anniversary
body: I have received a mystery gift, I believe it was from riot, but I have not received the summoner icon. It took days for me to receive the gift as well. Idk if this is just some glitch or am i missing something?

replies.body: Ok, thank you. I just wasn't sure because I had received a gift but not the icon and all my friends already had it lol. Thank you tho!

We're still sending these icons out, so give us some time to get to you. 

If you don't see it by the 23rd, please let me know.
The gifts go out one by and you should have everything by 9/23.
